conferenceOverview: Welcome to the official website of the 2021 Canadian Undergraduate Mathematics Conference (CUMC)! The CUMC is a Canada-wide conference aimed at undergraduate students in the mathematical sciences. This year's CUMC will be hosted from August 19-22 by Western University. This website is the main source of information regarding the conference. Check back regularly for updates!
conferenceDetails: At this point, it's impossible to know whether the conference will be held in-person or virtually. The organizing committee hopes to hold the conference in-person, but there are plans in place to run the conference virtually if needed. We appreciate your patience at this time.
conferenceBooklet: The conference booklet, once available, will be found here.
